div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p: Go to covid.sd.gov for information pertaining to COVID-19 in South Dakota. The site has FAQ's and other prevention materials along with case updates and a community impact...
Free lunch and breakfast will be provided upon request for ALL Hanson School District Students Pre-K through 12th grade. They will receive a cold sack lunch and the next...

div.p: Governor Kristi Noem recommended that all schools are closed through the end of the school year in response to preventing the spread of COVID-19 . Hanson School will...
Today's Senior Spotlights for Brody Chivington https://5il.co/fn29 and Caden Haiar https://5il.co/fn2a
We will be posting a few of our senior spotlights over the next few weeks. Check out today's spotlights for seniors Kameron Brown https://5il.co/fn27 and Marcus Brown https://5il.co/fn28

Students in Grades 8-11. Student council applications for the 2020-2021 school year need to be emailed to both Mrs. Alley and Mrs. Wallace by 11:59pm on May 1. Requirements have been emailed to all 8th through 11th grade students.
Grade 8th - 11th Parents, Please remind your students to check their email for Zoom meeting time on Thursday with Mr. Slaba regarding Pre-Registration Information for next year's classes. Thank You.
